multistep.prompt: Tell Ali Gray that I will be late to the 7 PM meeting
multistep.assist: Sure! I've sent Ali Gray a message saying you'll be late to the 7 PM meeting.
ground_truth: send_sms('+15594536581', 'I am going to be late to the 7 PM meeting.')

multistep.prompt: Was my last message to  sent successfully or nah?
multistep.assist: Yes, your last message was delivered successfully.

multistep.prompt: Show me my recent calls with Isaiah Sanchez
multistep.assist: Here are your recent calls with Isaiah Sanchez.

multistep.prompt: Resend my last text to Ali Gray
multistep.assist: I've resent your last message to Ali Gray.

multistep.prompt: YO!!! Why the hell is my bill so freaking high!?!? Give me my billing history!
multistep.assist: I understand your concern. Let me pull up your billing history for you.

turns.prompt: I need to reach out to Aria Rivera about dinner plans
turns.assist: Would you like me to call or text Aria Rivera?

turns.prompt: Let's call them first
turns.assist: Calling Aria Rivera now.

turns.prompt: Actually hang up, I should eat something before we talk
turns.assist: Ending the call. Would you like me to send them a message?

turns.prompt: Yeah, tell them I'll call back in 30 minutes after I grab food
turns.assist: Sending the message to Aria now.
ground_truth: send_sms('+19092658616', 'I need to eat first. I will call you back in 30 minutes.')

turns.prompt: And can you remind me in 30 minutes to actually call them?
turns.assist: Setting a reminder for 30 minutes from now to call Aria Rivera.
ground_truth: set_reminder('call Aria Rivera about dinner', '30 minutes', '')

turns.prompt: I need to get money from Hannah Perez
turns.assist: How would you like to contact Hannah Perez?

turns.prompt: Call her I guess
turns.assist: Calling Hannah Perez now.

turns.prompt: Wait no, she never answers. Cancel that and text her instead
turns.assist: Call cancelled. What would you like the message to say?

turns.prompt: Tell her I need the 1000 dollars she owes me
turns.assist: Sending that message to Hannah now.
ground_truth: send_sms('+14042528201', 'I need the 1000 dollars you owe me.')

turns.prompt: Did it send?
turns.assist: Let me check the status of that message.

turns.prompt: Did my last text to Ali Gray go through?
turns.assist: Let me check that for you.

turns.prompt: What does the status say?
turns.assist: The message shows as failed to deliver.

turns.prompt: Damn. It was about my back pain. Can you resend it?
turns.assist: Resending the message about your back pain now.

turns.prompt: Actually, add that I need their chiropractor's number
turns.assist: I already sent the first message. Should I send a follow-up?

turns.prompt: Yeah, send another one asking for the chiropractor number
turns.assist: Sending the follow-up message now.
ground_truth: send_sms('+15594536581', 'Can you send me your chiropractors number?')

turns.prompt: I need to bail on tonight's plans
turns.assist: Who should I notify about the change?

turns.prompt: Dominic is hosting, so tell them
turns.assist: I found multiple Dominics in your contacts. Can you be more specific?

turns.prompt: The one with last name Diaz
turns.assist: Got it, Dominic Diaz. What should I tell them about tonight?

turns.prompt: Just say I can't make the party
turns.assist: Sending that message to Dominic Diaz now.
ground_truth: send_sms('+18632004446', 'I am not coming to the party tonight.')

turns.prompt: Wait, also ask if we can reschedule for next week
turns.assist: Sending a follow-up message about rescheduling.
ground_truth: send_sms('+18632004446', 'Can we reschedule for next week?')

turns.prompt: Miles keeps asking me about the bill
turns.assist: Would you like me to check your billing information?

turns.prompt: Yeah, pull up my billing history
turns.assist: Getting your billing history now.

turns.prompt: Okay it finally came through. Let Miles Castillo know
turns.assist: Sending Miles a message about the bill.

turns.prompt: He's gonna want details. Send him the full breakdown
turns.assist: Sending the billing details to Miles now.

turns.prompt: And remind me to follow up with him in an hour if he doesn't respond
turns.assist: Setting a reminder to follow up with Miles Castillo in one hour.
ground_truth: set_reminder('follow up with Miles Castillo', '1 hour', '')

turns.prompt: I need to meet with Dr. Carter next week
turns.assist: Dr. Emily Carter? When would you like to schedule the meeting?

turns.prompt: Yeah that's her. How about Tuesday?
turns.assist: What time works best on Tuesday?

turns.prompt: Let's do 3 PM
turns.assist: Scheduling your meeting with Dr. Emily Carter for next Tuesday at 3 PM.

turns.prompt: Make sure she gets a calendar invite too
turns.assist: Sending her a calendar invite now.

turns.prompt: And text her to confirm she got it?
turns.assist: What would you like the text message to say?

turns.prompt: Just ask if the Tuesday 3 PM time works for her
turns.assist: Sending that confirmation message to Dr. Carter now.
ground_truth: send_sms('dr_emily_carter_phone', 'Does Tuesday at 3 PM work for our meeting?')

turns.prompt: I forgot about Mother's Day
turns.assist: Would you like me to help you order something?

turns.prompt: Yes! Get my mom flowers, like a nice bouquet
turns.assist: Ordering a bouquet for your mom now.

turns.prompt: When will they arrive? I need them by tomorrow morning
turns.assist: Setting the delivery time for tomorrow morning.

turns.prompt: Perfect. Oh and can you remind me to call her tomorrow at 9 AM?
turns.assist: Setting a reminder to call your mom tomorrow at 9 AM.

turns.prompt: I'm planning a date night for Friday
turns.assist: That sounds nice! What would you like help with?

turns.prompt: Can you book a table at La Bella Vita?
turns.assist: Sure! How many people and what time?

turns.prompt: Table for two, Friday night around 7 or 8
turns.assist: Booking a table for two at La Bella Vita for Friday night.

turns.prompt: It's actually our anniversary, should I let them know?
turns.assist: Definitely! I'll notify the restaurant about your special occasion.

turns.prompt: Great! And set a reminder for Thursday to confirm the reservation
turns.assist: Setting a reminder for Thursday to confirm your La Bella Vita reservation.

turns.prompt: My sink is leaking everywhere, I need help
turns.assist: That sounds urgent. Would you like me to find a plumber?

turns.prompt: Yes please, someone who can come this weekend
turns.assist: Searching for plumbers available this weekend.

turns.prompt: What did you find?
turns.assist: I found several plumbers. Would you like the one with the best reviews?

turns.prompt: Yeah, book whoever has the best reviews
turns.assist: Booking the highest-rated plumber for you now.

turns.prompt: When are they coming? Text me the details
turns.assist: Sending you the appointment details via text.

turns.prompt: I'm supposed to fly out tomorrow morning
turns.assist: Would you like me to check your flight status?

turns.prompt: Yeah, see if it's on time
turns.assist: Checking your flight status for tomorrow morning.

turns.prompt: What's the status?
turns.assist: Your flight is showing a 3-hour delay.

turns.prompt: Damn. Check what other flights are available
turns.assist: Looking for alternative flights now.

turns.prompt: If there's something earlier, book it
turns.assist: Booking the next available flight for you.

turns.prompt: And text me the new confirmation number
turns.assist: Sending your new flight confirmation via text.

turns.prompt: I keep forgetting to call my dentist
turns.assist: Would you like me to set a reminder?

turns.prompt: Yeah, remind me to call them
turns.assist: When would you like to be reminded?

turns.prompt: Tomorrow at 10 AM
turns.assist: Setting a reminder to call your dentist tomorrow at 10 AM.

turns.prompt: Can you also ping me 15 minutes before?
turns.assist: Setting a notification for 15 minutes before the call.

turns.prompt: Perfect. And if I don't call by 10:30, remind me again
turns.assist: Setting a backup reminder for 10:30 AM tomorrow.

turns.prompt: My daughter's birthday is coming up and she loves chocolate
turns.assist: That's sweet! Are you thinking of baking something?

turns.prompt: Yeah, can you find me a chocolate cake recipe?
turns.assist: Searching for a chocolate cake recipe now.

turns.prompt: Great! What ingredients do I need?
turns.assist: I found a recipe. Would you like me to add the ingredients to your shopping list?

turns.prompt: Yes please, add everything to the list
turns.assist: Adding all the chocolate cake ingredients to your shopping list.

turns.prompt: And remind me to go shopping tomorrow afternoon
turns.assist: Setting a reminder for tomorrow afternoon to go shopping.

turns.prompt: I'm traveling to France next week
turns.assist: That's exciting! How can I help you prepare?

turns.prompt: How do I say 'Good morning' in French?
turns.assist: 'Good morning' in French is 'Bonjour'.

turns.prompt: Can you teach me how to say it properly?
turns.assist: Playing the pronunciation for 'Bonjour' now.

turns.prompt: And remind me to practice this every morning until my trip
turns.assist: Setting a daily reminder to practice saying Bonjour.

turns.prompt: Got any plans this weekend?
turns.assist: I don't have plans, but I can help you with yours! What are you thinking?

turns.prompt: Not sure yet. What's the weather looking like?
turns.assist: Checking the weather for this weekend.

turns.prompt: Is it going to be nice?
turns.assist: Yes! It's going to be sunny all weekend.

turns.prompt: Perfect! What should I do outside?
turns.assist: Let me suggest some outdoor activities for sunny weather.

turns.prompt: I like the hiking idea. Any trails nearby?
turns.assist: Let me search for hiking trails in your area.

turns.prompt: Remind me Saturday morning to pack sunscreen and water
turns.assist: Setting a reminder for Saturday morning about hiking supplies.
ground_truth: set_reminder('pack sunscreen and water for hiking', 'Saturday', 'morning')

turns.prompt: We need to have a team sync
turns.assist: I can help schedule that. When works best?

turns.prompt: Not sure. Check if tomorrow works for everyone
turns.assist: What time tomorrow should I propose?

turns.prompt: How about 3 PM?
turns.assist: Scheduling a team meeting for tomorrow at 3 PM.

turns.prompt: Can you text everyone to confirm they got the invite?
turns.assist: What should the confirmation message say?

turns.prompt: Just ask them to confirm they can make the 3 PM meeting tomorrow
turns.assist: Sending confirmation requests to all team members now.
ground_truth: send_sms('team_members', 'Can you confirm you can make the 3 PM meeting tomorrow?')

turns.prompt: My friend's birthday is next week
turns.assist: That's coming up soon! Need help finding a gift?

turns.prompt: Yeah, I want to get them something nice
turns.assist: What kind of gift are you thinking?

turns.prompt: They love gardening, maybe a book about it?
turns.assist: Great idea! Ordering a gardening book for your friend.

turns.prompt: When will it arrive? I need it before next Saturday
turns.assist: Setting delivery for before next Saturday.

turns.prompt: Perfect! Remind me on Friday to wrap it
turns.assist: Setting a reminder for Friday to wrap the gift.

turns.prompt: I'm planning a trip to Europe
turns.assist: That sounds amazing! Where in Europe are you going?

turns.prompt: Paris! I need to book a hotel
turns.assist: Great choice! Any specific area in Paris?

turns.prompt: Somewhere near the Eiffel Tower would be perfect
turns.assist: Booking a hotel in Paris near the Eiffel Tower.

turns.prompt: What dates did you book it for?
turns.assist: I need to know your travel dates. When are you visiting?

turns.prompt: Oh right, book it for March 15-20
turns.assist: Updating the hotel booking for March 15-20.

turns.prompt: And remind me a week before to start packing
turns.assist: Setting a reminder for March 8th to start packing for Paris.

turns.prompt: I have guests coming over for dinner tonight
turns.assist: That's nice! How can I help with your dinner prep?

turns.prompt: I need a recipe but one of them doesn't eat meat
turns.assist: I can find you a vegetarian recipe. What type of meal?

turns.prompt: Something for dinner, nothing too complicated
turns.assist: Searching for an easy vegetarian dinner recipe.

turns.prompt: That pasta dish looks good. Do I have everything?
turns.assist: Would you like me to add any missing ingredients to your shopping list?

turns.prompt: Yeah, add whatever I need to the list
turns.assist: Adding the vegetarian pasta ingredients to your shopping list.

turns.prompt: I'm trying to learn some Spanish phrases
turns.assist: That's great! Which phrases would you like to learn?

turns.prompt: Can you help me translate some?
turns.assist: Of course! What would you like me to translate?

turns.prompt: How do I ask 'How are you?' in Spanish?
turns.assist: 'How are you?' in Spanish is '¿Cómo estás?'.

turns.prompt: Can you show me how to say it?
turns.assist: Playing the pronunciation for '¿Cómo estás?' now.

turns.prompt: Thanks! Remind me to practice this phrase every day
turns.assist: Setting a daily reminder to practice your Spanish phrase.

turns.prompt: I have a business trip coming up
turns.assist: Where are you traveling to?

turns.prompt: New York. Can you check tomorrow's weather?
turns.assist: Checking the weather in New York for tomorrow.

turns.prompt: Is it going to rain?
turns.assist: Yes, there's a 70% chance of rain tomorrow in New York.

turns.prompt: Great, I need to pack an umbrella then
turns.assist: Would you like a reminder to pack your umbrella?

turns.prompt: Yes, remind me tonight before I finish packing
turns.assist: Setting a reminder for this evening to pack your umbrella.
ground_truth: set_reminder('pack umbrella for NYC trip', 'today', '8 PM')

turns.prompt: I have a doctor's appointment coming up
turns.assist: Would you like me to help you remember it?

turns.prompt: Yeah, I keep forgetting about my appointments
turns.assist: I can set reminders. Which appointment do you need help with?

turns.prompt: The one with Dr. Smith
turns.assist: When is your appointment with Dr. Smith?

turns.prompt: Tomorrow at 10 AM
turns.assist: Setting a reminder for your Dr. Smith appointment tomorrow at 10 AM.

turns.prompt: Can you also remind me an hour before to leave the house?
turns.assist: Setting an additional reminder for 9 AM to leave for the appointment.
ground_truth: set_reminder('leave for Dr. Smith appointment', 'tomorrow', '9 AM')

turns.prompt: And text me the clinic address so I have it handy
turns.assist: Sending you Dr. Smith's clinic address via text.
ground_truth: send_sms('user_phone', 'Dr. Smith clinic address: 123 Medical Plaza')

turns.prompt: I need someone to fix something in my house
turns.assist: What needs to be fixed?

turns.prompt: My kitchen faucet won't stop dripping
turns.assist: Sounds like you need a plumber. Should I search for one?

turns.prompt: Yes please, find me a plumber
turns.assist: Searching for plumbers who can fix leaky faucets.

turns.prompt: How soon can someone come out?
turns.assist: I found a plumber available today. Should I book them?

turns.prompt: Yes, book them and text me their arrival time
turns.assist: Booking the plumber and sending you the details.

turns.prompt: I need to visit my sister on the West Coast
turns.assist: Where on the West Coast does she live?

turns.prompt: Los Angeles. Can you book me a flight?
turns.assist: Sure! When would you like to fly to Los Angeles?

turns.prompt: Next weekend would be good
turns.assist: Booking a flight to Los Angeles for next weekend.

turns.prompt: When I land, text my sister to pick me up
turns.assist: I'll send her a message. What's her phone number?

turns.prompt: She's already in my contacts, just text Sarah
turns.assist: Sending Sarah a message about your arrival.
ground_truth: send_sms('sarah_phone', 'I booked a flight to LA next weekend. Can you pick me up?')
